Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Enum Constants
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    com.here.sdk.routing.EVDetails

    Will be removed in v4.24.0. Please use Route.getConsumptionInKilowattHours() and Section.getConsumptionInKilowattHours() accordingly.
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    com.here.sdk.core.engine.SDKOptions.accessKeyId

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use constructor with AuthenticationMode
    com.here.sdk.core.engine.SDKOptions.accessKeySecret

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use constructor with AuthenticationMode
    com.here.sdk.routing.RouteOptions.occupantsNumber

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use RouteOptions.occupantsNumber in corresponding transport mode options instead, like CarOptions.occupantsNumber.
    com.here.sdk.routing.Toll.tollSystem

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use Toll.tollSystems instead.
    com.here.sdk.routing.ViolatedRestriction.Details.maxGrossWeightInKilograms

    Will be remove in v4.24.0. Use ViolatedRestriction.Details.maxWeight instead.
    com.here.sdk.routing.Waypoint.isChargingStation

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use Waypoint.chargingStop instead.
    com.here.sdk.search.EVChargingPoolDetails.paymentIsRequired

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Current value is always set to false.
    com.here.sdk.search.EVChargingPoolDetails.subscriptionIsRequired

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Current value is always set to false.
    com.here.sdk.search.WebImage.date

    Will be removed in v4.24.0.
    com.here.sdk.search.WebImage.publicationDate

    Will be removed in v4.24.0.
    com.here.sdk.transport.BusSpecifications.lastCharacterOfLicensePlate

    Will be removed in v4.24.0. Please use corresponding field in BusOptions.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    com.here.sdk.routing.Route.getEVDetails()

    Will be removed in v4.24.0. Please use Route.getConsumptionInKilowattHours().
    com.here.sdk.routing.Section.getEvDetails()

    Will be removed in v4.24.0. Please use Section.getConsumptionInKilowattHours().
    com.here.sdk.search.SearchEngine.search​(TextQuery, SearchOptions, SearchCallback)

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use SearchInterface.searchByText(com.here.sdk.search.TextQuery, com.here.sdk.search.SearchOptions, com.here.sdk.search.SearchCallback) instead.
    com.here.sdk.search.SearchEngine.searchPickedPlace​(PickedPlace, LanguageCode, PlaceIdSearchCallback)

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use SearchInterface.searchByPickedPlace(com.here.sdk.core.PickedPlace, com.here.sdk.core.LanguageCode, com.here.sdk.search.PlaceIdSearchCallback) instead.
    com.here.sdk.search.SearchEngine.suggest​(TextQuery, SearchOptions, SuggestCallback)

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use SearchInterface.suggestByText(com.here.sdk.search.TextQuery, com.here.sdk.search.SearchOptions, com.here.sdk.search.SuggestCallback) instead.
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    com.here.sdk.core.engine.SDKOptions​(String)

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use constructor with AuthenticationMode
    com.here.sdk.search.EVChargingStation​(String, String, String, String, String, Double, Integer, Integer, String, String, String, Integer)

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Use the default constructor instead.
    com.here.sdk.search.WebImage​(Date, WebSource)

    Will be removed in v4.24.0. Use the constructor that takes only WebSource instead.
  • Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant Description
    com.here.sdk.core.engine.LayerConfiguration.Feature.TRAFFIC

    This feature has been renamed to LayerConfiguration.Feature.RDS_TRAFFIC and will be removed in v4.23.0. Please use LayerConfiguration.Feature.RDS_TRAFFIC instead.
    com.here.sdk.mapview.MapMeasure.Kind.DISTANCE

    Will be removed in v4.23.0. Use MapMeasure.Kind.DISTANCE_IN_METERS instead.
    com.here.sdk.search.SearchError.INVALID_PARAMETER

    Will be removed in v4.24.0. Use newly added concrete errors instead.
